reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, with one mentioning it's perfect for wearing with flats, and they appreciate its shimmer and flattering design, particularly noting it works well for plus size figures.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable
items.body: The stress was high quality and totally worth the price. It was almost floor length on me and I am 5'4. It did not wrinkle and was easy to wash. This will be a go-to item for semi-formal-related items. It's definitely flattering to a plus size figure. The color is exactly as promised. It was very comfortable to wear and had mild stretch. The cut covers a multitude of sins I have larger breasts and was able to fully fill out the top and I feel like it would still be okay for a smaller chested woman. Read more
items.author: wendy fitzgerald

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was so shocked!! (in a good way!)
items.body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: I honestly didn't have high hopes for this dress. I was concerned about the fit, the feel, the quality and how it was going to look on my squishy body. Once I tried it on, all my worries went away. It fit perfectly, it felt good, it actually looked good and I like that it's not itchy or anything like that. I was kind of over the moon with the fit of this dress. I'm looking forward to wearing it on formal night on the cruise. Read more
items.author: Tracie Gerber

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent dress! Fits well, wonderful material & overnight shopping. Love it!
items.body: I love this dress and am so relieved it got here overnight! I had rented 2 dresses from rent the runway and neither fit. Very slim pickings for the overnight dresses they give you when you get the wrong size, so I bought this as a backup. It’s wonderful! The material is stretchy and not thin. It falls nicely and was not wrinkled out of the package so will travel well. Perfect length for me to wear with flats. I may have been able to go a size smaller, but I’m happy with the 18. I’m 5’10”, 190 lbs, and very busty. The cut of the neck is not too low even without pinning it. The color is beautiful. Dark blue with subtle silver sparkles. Great value at even twice the cost. I’m very happy with my purchase! Read more
items.author: Another Bizzy Mom

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is pretty.
items.body: The fit is great. It looks good on. The material is not soft, but it is okay. I wouldn't wear it on a warm day. Read more
items.author: Sarah Calla

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fine dress, problematic chest
items.body: I wore this to a black-tie wedding, and it was fine. It is stretchy, and the fabric is not heavy. I was comfortable the whole night and didn't feel overheated. The chest didn't fit properly, and I had to be careful not to show my bra. I didn't order the dress with enough time to address the chest issue before my event; however, if I had, I would have been able to fix the problem with a pin or some stitching. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering
items.body: Beautiful dress and was flattering. I bought 3 and this was the dress I chose as the most flattering and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Amy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made, good fit, god price
items.body: Fit as expected. Was perfect for the wedding (long dresses requested) . Good buy for the price. The bottom was not quite as flared as the picture but that might have as much to do with my shape as the dress's. It is not high end or fancy - I would not expect that for this price, but it was perfect for me. Read more
items.author: Maria P

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress
items.body: It was flowy, comfortable, long enough, but I did have to get a bigger size then usually but it's gonna be good for dancing all night in it Read more
items.author: Maria Galindo

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Purple, Black-regular, Burgundy, Hot Pink, Black, Champagne, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
